sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A song of Syon of the beauty of Bethell the glory of Gods own house. By a citizen of Syon. Citizen of Syon.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed for William Larnar at the signe of the Bible in East-Cheap, London : 1642.
Verse - "One a thing beleevers hearts are fixt upon," -- "a" is superscript and refers to side note "a". A religious poem. Reproduction of the originals in the British Library.
=======

William Larnar
the signe of the Bible in East-Cheap
